verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come Lord Jesus, x3
Come and be born
in our hearts

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come Prince of peace, x3
Come and be born
in our hearts.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Our hearts are open, x3
Come and be born
in our hearts.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come Emmanuel, x3
Come and be born
in our hearts.
